title: Slipstream Think-Quantize-Transmit Dataset
subtitle: Training data for 82% token reduction in multi-agent AI communication
description: This dataset trains LLMs to use the Slipstream protocol - a semantic quantization system for efficient multi-agent coordination. Models learn the Think-Quantize-Transmit (TQT) cognitive pattern: reason about intent, map to semantic anchors, and output compact wire-format messages. Achieves 82% token reduction compared to JSON messaging.

data.description: Training dataset in ShareGPT JSONL format
data.name: slipstream_train_combined.jsonl
